panels.title: Total Network Received (with all virtual devices) by instance

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu", job=~"$job", cluster="$cluster"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", job=~"$job", cluster="$cluster"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", job=~"$job", cluster="$cluster"}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", job=~"$job", cluster="$cluster"}) by (container)

panels.title: Memory Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu", job=~"$job", cluster="$cluster"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory", job=~"$job", cluster="$cluster"})

panels.description: 95th percentile request latency for Kubernetes apiserver component
panels.title: apiserver request latency
PVCs Full in 2 days - Based on Daily Usage
PVCs Full in 5 days - Based on Daily Usage
PVCs Full in 1 Week - Based on Daily Usage

targets.expr: count (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{namespace=~"${namespace}"} ) and (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{namespace=~"${namespace}"} )) / (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace=~"${namespace}"} )) >= (${warning_threshold} / 100)) or vector (0)
